subject: Skiing

World Cup (Skiing)
Retirement
lead_paragraph: After flaming out in the Turin Games in 2006, Bode Miller rejoins the United States Ski Team and looks forward to competing in the Vancouver Olympics.
snippet: After flaming out in the Turin Games in 2006, Bode Miller rejoins the United States Ski Team and looks forward to competing in the Vancouver Olympics.
